name: Trust Signals
description: Evaluates credibility markers, author bios, contact info, security, and third-party trust indicators.

insights.title: Excellent Security Posture
insights.description: HTTPS everywhere, valid SSL, and security headers signal trustworthiness to AI.

insights.title: Clear Business Entity
insights.description: Complete contact info, business registration, and physical address verify legitimacy.

insights.title: Third-Party Validation
insights.description: BBB accreditation, industry certifications, and trust badges enhance credibility.

issues.title: Missing Privacy Policy Updates
issues.description: Privacy policy hasn't been updated since 2022, raising compliance questions.

issues.title: Incomplete Social Proof
issues.description: Customer reviews and testimonials lack structured data markup.

issues.title: No Clear Correction Policy
issues.description: Missing editorial policy for corrections, important for news/content sites.

recommendations.description: Refresh privacy policy and terms of service with current dates and regulations.
Implement AggregateRating and Review structured data for testimonials.
recommendations.estimatedImpact: Enhanced social proof in AI responses

recommendations.description: Publish transparent editorial and correction policies.
